content: fall gingham kitchen towel is a pretty squishy thick towel for using in your kitchen this fall it is great for drying hands or dishes or for cleaning up spills it s part of my fall gingham kitchen set which includes this towel a dishcloth a hot pad and a placemat this description contains affiliate links if you click one and then make a purchase i will earn a small commission at no additional cost to you see my disclosure 1 for details this pattern is available free ad-supported on my website here https //bananamoonstudio com/fall-crochet-kitchen-towel-pattern/ you also have the option to purchase an inexpensive pdf that includes a matching dishcloth hot pad and placemat you can get that here on ravelry or in my etsy shop 2 difficulty level intermediate finished measurements 16 x 24 1/2 inches yarn we crochet dishie 3 100% cotton 190 yds 100 g yarn weight category 4/worsted/medium #25403 clementine #25409 swan and #28245 clementine twist note that swan and clementine are available in cones 4 760 yds 400 g this may be a good choice if you plan to make several items as the cones are a little cheaper than the same amount of yarn in skeins yardage 117 yds swan 216 yds clementine twist 101 yds clementine crochet hook j 6 mm 5 or size needed to match gauge notions tapestry needle 6 gauge 14 sts x 16 row = 4 inches in gingham stitch pattern to check gauge use the gingham stitch pattern to make a swatch with 2 columns of 2 squares each after blocking this should measure about 4 inches square get a free digital gift when you subscribe to my newsletter https
